get.description:

Account status is recalculated based on the error count in the latest req.

id.description: The ID of this Account, used to refer to this account in other API calls.

created.description: The date & time at which the account object was created.

last_accessed.description: The date & time at which the account object was last accessed.

status.description: The processing status of this account.

institution_id.description: The ASPSP associated with this account.

owner_name.description: The name of the account owner.

scan.description: SortCodeAccountNumber returned by some UK banks (6 digit Sort Code and 8 digit Account Number)

id.title: End User Agreement ID
id.description: The ID of this End User Agreement, used to refer to this end user agreement in other API calls.

created.title: Created Date
created.description: The date & time at which the end user agreement was created.

institution_id.description: an Institution ID for this EUA

max_historical_days.title: Maximum Historical Days
max_historical_days.description: Maximum number of days of transaction data to retrieve.

access_valid_for_days.title: Access Valid For (Days)
access_valid_for_days.description: Number of days from acceptance that the access can be used.

access_scope.title: Level of information to access (by default all)
access_scope.description: Array containing one or several values of ['balances', 'details', 'transactions']

accepted.title: Accepted Date
accepted.description: The date & time at which the end user accepted the agreement.

institution_id.description: an Institution ID for this EUA

created.description: The date & time at which the requisition was created.

redirect.description: redirect URL to your application after end-user authorization with ASPSP

institution_id.description: an Institution ID for this Requisition

reference.description: additional ID to identify the end user

accounts.description: array of account IDs retrieved within a scope of this requisition

link.description: link to initiate authorization with Institution

ssn.description: optional SSN field to verify ownership of the account

redirect_immediate.description: enable redirect back to the client after account list received
